name: Designing Digitally
tag_list: second-life, virtual-worlds, virtual-world-company, virtual-world-companies, virtual-learning-company, online-learning, web-based-training, computer-based-training
overview:
As an award-winning full-service provider of interactive and engaging E-Learning programs, Serious Games, 3D Training Simulations, Virtual Worlds and Web design services, Designing Digitally, Inc. is dedicated to developing creative, end-to-end, digital design solutions for your company or organization. We work alongside your team to help overhaul, develop, and/or improve all aspects of your visual communication systems with appealing, professional, interactive designs. With over a decade of experience creating engaging interactive solutions, we develop your project efficiently and effectively from start to finish - all within a scheduled time period. We strive to provide your business with a prosperous return on investment by producing high quality interactive products while providing exceptional customer service.

Designing Digitally, Inc. will:

Help you identify the skills and tools needed to create an effective project development.

Provide professional development video tutorials on how to use the custom products we develop.

Collaborate with you to design and develop more effective and engaging initiatives.

Designing Digitally, Inc. is also a GSA MOBIS contract holder. Our GSA Contract gives all government agencies the opportunity to purchase quality design services at pre-negotiated prices, allowing for an easy transaction.

Interested in our Virtual World, E-Learning, Serious Games, Simulation, or Web design services? Call 1-866-316-9126 to speak to a representative to discuss your interactive project and how Designing Digitally can help you master the digital age! You can view our portfolio by visiting:

http://www.designingdigitally.com

milestones.description: Nick Taylor is our Director of Development
